Service Details: - Provides policing services for West Kelowna and Westside- An additional 25 provincial RCMP officers police Peachland, the Central Okanagan West Electoral Area, Hwy 97C/Okanagan Connector to Sunset Main, Okanagan Lake from Peachland to Lake Okanagan Resort, and rural areas on the east side of Okanagan Lake including Big White, Ellison and Joe Rich- Three officers are dedicated to First Nations policing
Major Intersection: Dobbin Rd and Old Okanagan Hwy
